name: In.My.Mind
description: In.My.Mind is an horror first person survival game: Explore! Solve the puzzles! Survive! Fight! Run!
minimum_requirements: İşletim Sistemi: Windows 8 - 8.1 - 10 64-bit İşlemci: Intel i5 2300+ or AMD FX 8150+ Bellek: 4 GB RAM Ekran Kartı: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960+ (3GB) or AMD Radeon HD 7950+ (3GB) DirectX: Sürüm 11 Depolama: 5 GB kullanılabilir alan Ses Kartı: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: Önerilen: İşletim Sistemi: Windows 10 64-bit İşlemci: Intel i7-3770+ or AMD FX 8350+ Bellek: 8 GB RAM Ekran Kartı: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970+ (4 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290+ (4 GB) DirectX: Sürüm 11 Depolama: 5 GB kullanılabilir alan Ses Kartı: DirectX compatible sound card
